name: Lux Nominem
description:
Lost deep in the heart of an antechamber that you do not know, little flickering lightbulb, your role will be not to survive, but to live.
Explore a strange dark room, and try to warm it a little by solving the scattered puzzles here and there. However everything has its value and the light of truth can sometimes come from very somber sources.
Do not let your light go out.

Team:
Seb (Lead Dev)
Stache (stuff)
Sophie (Lead Designer)
Ackim (Level Designer)

Made in 40 hours for the LUDUM DARE@EPAC!
